long_description: The Baby Jogger Universal Parent Console attaches to the handlebar of your single or double Baby Jogger stroller to offer extra, convenient storage of on-the-go necessities. Features a cup holder, insulated cooler pouch and an additional storage pouch for cell phone, keys and wallet.
short_description: The Baby Jogger Universal Parent Console attaches to the handlebar of your single or double Baby Jogger stroller to offer extra, convenient storage of on-the-go necessities.
